description.value: Upon reaching 20th level, you become a master of intrigue. You can apply @Compendium[pf1.feats.2YuxcUNFMPNBpekG]{Silent Spell} or @Compendium[pf1.feats.jVFjMIyQD6TOAsmj]{Still Spell} to any spell you cast without increasing the level or casting time. You do not need to possess these feats to use this ability.
